name: Oscar
quotes: This is where I wanna be - grouch paradise! Just look it at. It's like a work of art.
Now that was television! Why can't they do shows like that more often?
I prefer recorded concerts on badly scratched records.
Let's go back and do it again!
Hmmm, sort of go with the flow. You get my drift?
Hey everybody, quiet down! There's a bulletin on TV!
If I watch anymore of this hugging, I'm gonna get sick to my stomach!
